1. Trade talks with India to roll into the new year, EU trade chief says  politico.eu
  2. EU, India unlikely to finalize trade agreement by end of year, Bloomberg News reports  Reuters
  3. India-EU FTA in Final Stages, Signing on January 27; European Union Leaders to Grace Republic Day Parade  Times Now
  4. A new EU–India calculus  The International Institute for Strategic Studies
  5. EU, India trying to bridge gaps during tough phase of FTA talks  Fibre2Fashion
